name: raycast(origin:direction:length:query:mask:relativeTo:)
desc: Performs a convex ray cast against all the geometry in the scene for a ray of a given origin, direction, and length.
declaration: func raycast(origin: SIMD3<Float>, direction: SIMD3<Float>, length: Float = 100, query: CollisionCastQueryType = .all, mask: CollisionGroup = .all, relativeTo referenceEntity: Entity? = nil) -> [CollisionCastHit]
